findings.title: Vulnerable dependencies in Renec blockchain
findings.description: Renec blockchain uses dependencies with publicly known vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unmaintained and yanked dependencies in Renec blockchain
findings.description: Renec blockchain uses dependencies which are unmaintained or yanked.

findings.title: Cargo.toml manifest files contain wrong metadata
findings.description: Crates within the workspace have a misconfigured manifest file with incorrect 'repository' field in the [package] section.

findings.title: Confusing variable name
findings.description: The assertion `assert!(total < last)` will always fail because inflation remains consistently high at 4.5% over years.

findings.title: Crate stake-monitor is empty and not included in workspace
findings.description: `stake-monitor` is an empty crate with just a `Cargo.toml` file inside and it's not included as a workspace member.

findings.title: Inflation unit test failed
findings.description: A change of inflation behavior and rates breaks a unit test in _sdk/src/inflation.rs_. The assertion `assert!(total < last)` will always fail due to consistently high inflation rate.

findings.title: Relax linter for undefined behavior
findings.description: Warning on usage of uninitialized data in the Default implementation of Packet struct in sdk/src/packet.rs.

findings.title: Unmerged pull requests from Upstream to Renec
findings.description: There are fixes released on upstream v1.13 & v1.14 that could be applied to Renec v1.13.6 and future versions.
